Event Description: Reported when a new lava is activated (once, when the event is activated)
Columns Description: special event type
[name || start_date=local time(UTC) || segment_index]
event name as specified in the Admin system

User's segment - Concationation of the segment and the external segment. External segments will be concatinated at the end of the string with under score, and only when it's not configured as 'default'.
lava configuration name
theme_id
start date of event (timestamp)
end date of event (timestamp)
duration of event in minutes (end_date - start_date)
time left to end of the lava event (seconds)
Enrollment type: automatic=0 , voluntary=1
Number of rounds configured
Reward for completing all lava rounds - grand prize
